title: Tsgabu Grmay and His Dream to Turn More Ethiopians into Pro Cyclists
content:
The 32-year-old has been racing as a professional for 10 years and he wants to give back to his home country and help more riders turn pro.

Read the full article at Tsgabu Grmay and His Dream to Turn More Ethiopians into Pro Cyclists on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
